parameters:
\N<Hebeta>The guardian of this green room... the guide for the
training soldiers. When you're ready to proceed to the
stage, come talk to me again.
\N<Hebeta>...You seem to be in pain. Mind. Lyuda's erosion... maybe?

\N<Hebeta>You're about to step onto the battlefield, and in that
state, it's nothing but a disadvantage for you.

\N<Hebeta>Moreover... you haven't been informed about your body
falling into this condition. That's unfair, isn't it?

\N<Hebeta>Just this once... only once, remember that. Next time you
stand here, be more careful.

\N<Hebeta>And... drink this right now. Doing so will suppress the
aphrodisiac effects of the Mind. Lyuda raging inside you.

\N<Hebeta>Also... if it gets too tough during the fight, use this. It
might be a last resort that robs your spirit and body of
energy, but it's much better than needlessly prolonging your
suffering.

\N<Hebeta>But... don't forget. And be careful. Even if you take the
medicine I've given you now, its effects are only temporary.

\N<Hebeta>The remnants of Mind. Lyuda will continue to linger inside
your body.

\N<Hebeta>And that is... if left unchecked, it will eventually become
the cause of your ruin.
\N<Segi>Eh...? Oh, um... I did ask for your name earlier...
\N<Hebeta>Sister... drink the medicine I gave you.

\N<Hebeta>And... it's better not to taste Ryuda's aphrodisiac. I've
seen many women fall, both body and soul, because of it.

\N<Segi>...Yes. At this point, there's no need to panic anymore.
Please lead the way.

\N<Segi>Besides... after taking the medicine you mentioned, I feel
like the discomfort in my body has eased a bit...
\N<Hebeta>I see... Understood. I pray for your safety.
\N<Hebeta>What? Surprised to hear me say something like that?

\N<Hebeta>Ah... no, that's not it. That look on your face isn't about
'me', but rather that a soldier of Ryuda would say such a
thing.

\N<Hebeta>...I've heard about you. What happened to you and your
husband was unfortunate, but not everyone in Ryuda takes
pleasure in the misfortune of others.

\N<Hebeta>I think it won't hurt if at least one person like me prays
for the well-being of you and your husband.

\N<Segi>Oh, um... thank you very much. And... I apologize for any
disrespect I've shown.

\N<Hebeta>It's fine, no need for thanks. Sooner or later, you'll have
to deal with me anyway. And eventually, you'll come to
dislike me as well.
I need a little more time.
もう少し待って欲しい
もう少し待って欲しい
\N<Segi>What could it be... My body is getting even hotter...

\N<Segi>Zuuteruka and... the soldiers earlier mentioned it too... Is
this what they mean by the erosion of Mind Luda...?
